title: Crow Boy
description: Step inside the mind of Crow Boy as you take a journey through bullying and isolation, to find friendship and understanding.
author: Taro Yashima
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=egrNdt3Hcuw

content.caption: User enters at their allocated time based on the timer outside of the entrance.
Once in the space, they see the first set of objects and also notices sounds of bullying playing in the back.
They approach the objects. The sound cuts out as soon as they are next to the objects.
This is because the sensory motion technology detected their presence. It soon projects an excerpt next to the objects, telling the user the harsh reality behind the objects.
Once done, they progress to the next set of objects.
Vice versa, sound is muted and a projection is seen as the user interacts with the objects.
After, they turn the corner and are met with bugs painted in the ground which act like step stones. They also notice an opening at the end.
The user crawls into the opening, realising they are in a tunnel.
Once out of the tunnel, they are in a narrow corridor filled with graffiti that writes insults on the walls. They see an opening on the end.
Proceeding into the opening, they enter the final section. Once done, they make their way out of the exit.
